    • Method Detail

      • create

        Trigger create(Trigger toCreate)
               throws HttpException
        Parameters:
        toCreate - the trigger to be created over the API
        Returns:
        the trigger that was passed in with the id field updated, on successful operation
        Throws:
        HttpException - if failed to create feed over the API
        ParseToObjectException - if failed to parse the returned json to trigger

      • get

        Trigger get(java.lang.Integer triggerId)
            throws HttpException,
                   ParseToObjectException
        Parameters:
        triggerId - the id of the trigger to be retrieved
        Returns:
        a feed object parsed from the json returned from the API
        Throws:
        HttpException - if failed to get trigger over the API
        ParseToObjectException - if failed to parse the returned json to trigger

      • list

        java.util.Collection<Trigger> list()
                                   throws HttpException,
                                          ParseToObjectException
        Returns:
        all triggers for this authenticated account
        Throws:
        HttpException - if failed to get triggers over the API
        ParseToObjectException - if failed to parse the returned json to trigger

      • getByFeedId

        java.util.Collection<Trigger> getByFeedId(int feedId)
                                          throws HttpException,
                                                 ParseToObjectException
        Parameters:
        triggerId - the id of the trigger to be retrieved
        feedId -
        Returns:
        a collection of trigger objects matching the params, parsed from the json returned from the API
        Throws:
        HttpException - if failed to get trigger over the API
        ParseToObjectException - if failed to parse the returned json to trigger

      • update

        Trigger update(Trigger toUpdate)
               throws HttpException
        Parameters:
        toUpdate - the trigger to be updated over the API
        Returns:
        the trigger that was passed in, on successful operation
        Throws:
        HttpException - if failed to get trigger over the API

      • delete

        void delete(java.lang.Integer triggerId)
            throws HttpException
        Parameters:
        triggerId - the id of the trigger to be deleted over the API
        Throws:
        HttpException - if failed to delete the trigger over the API
